Key Match Events: Edwin Diaz gave up a game-winning grand slam in the eighth inning
Others: Luis Severino was removed after 4 ²/₃ innings in which he allowed four earned runs on eight hits with nine strikeouts and one walk
Starling Marte's legwork was the difference in the Mets scoring the go-ahead run in the sixth inning

Luis Guillorme, playing against his former team in a third different uniform this season, worked his at-bat to nine pitches in the second inning before poking an RBI single that put the Mets in a 1-0 hole
